input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
CRANKBROTHERs Crank Brothers Multi Bicycle Tool (17-Function)

Product keywords:
Wrench: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8
1-phillips, 1-flat screwdriver
3.5 inches long / 89mm 
chain tool 
disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench
four spoke wrench sizes; 8mm and 10mm open wrench 
Specs: Weight: 168 grams; Length - 3.5 inches; Frame - 6061-T6 aluminum; Tools - 6051 high tensile steel.
input_text.Response A: The Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop with 44 Inch Acrylic Backboard is a high-quality portable basketball system that provides an NBA-level playing experience. With a 44-inch steel framed acrylic backboard, the system offers superior rebound performance and durability. The Slam jam breakaway rim is a 5/8 inch heavy-duty solid steel rim that provides professional-level performance. The system also features a 3-piece, 3-inch round pole system that ensures stability and durability. The Ratchet lift mechanism allows for easy height adjustment from 8 feet to 10 feet in 4-inch increments. The portable Basketball Rim adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet, so it can be used by players of all ages and skill levels. The base of the system can be filled with water or sand for added stability. Overall, the Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop with 44 Inch Acrylic Backboard is a high-quality portable basketball system that is designed to provide years of professional-level performance.
input_text.Response B: This tool is your go-to for all your bike repair needs! With 17 functions, it can fix just about anything. It includes a wrench, screwdriver, chain tool, and disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench. It even has a four spoke wrench and an 8mm and 10mm open wrench. Made with high-quality materials like 6061-T6 aluminum and 6051 high tensile steel, you can be sure this tool will last. It's also easy to carry around with you on your bike rides. No longer will you have to worry about being stranded with a broken bike!

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.factors_a: Product in response differs from product in prompt
label_annotations.factors_b: Included limited information, suggests the tool can fix objects other than bikes. Some products not correctly described
